languages.text: "Их... их цвета!.. Ужасные, пугающие, изорванные в клочья оттенки! Лишь безумец мог сотворить с собой подобное..." {n}Кассия в ужасе отводит взгляд.{/n}
"Their... their colours! Horrible, frightening, tattered shades! Only a madman could do something like that to himself..." {n}Cassia looks away, horrified.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Их... их цвета!.. Ужасные, пугающие, изорванные в клочья оттенки! Лишь безумец мог сотворить с собой подобное..." {n}Кассия в ужасе отводит взгляд.{/n}

languages.text: “他们……他们的颜色！那些可怕的影子残缺不全！只有疯子才会对自己做出这样的事情……”{n}卡西娅惊恐地移开了视线。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Their... their colours! Horrible, frightening, tattered shades! Only a madman could do something like that to himself..." {n}Cassia looks away, horrified.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “他们……他们的颜色！那些可怕的影子残缺不全！只有疯子才会对自己做出这样的事情……”{n}卡西娅惊恐地移开了视线。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ihre ... ihre Farben! Grauenhafte, furchterregende, zerschlissene Töne! Nur ein Wahnsinniger könnte sich selbst so etwas antun ..." {n}Cassia blickt entsetzt weg.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Their... their colours! Horrible, frightening, tattered shades! Only a madman could do something like that to himself..." {n}Cassia looks away, horrified.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihre ... ihre Farben! Grauenhafte, furchterregende, zerschlissene Töne! Nur ein Wahnsinniger könnte sich selbst so etwas antun ..." {n}Cassia blickt entsetzt weg.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Sus... sus colores! ¡Qué jirones tan terribles y pavorosos! Solo un loco se haría algo semejante a sí mismo...». {n}Cassia aparta la mirada, horrorizada.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Their... their colours! Horrible, frightening, tattered shades! Only a madman could do something like that to himself..." {n}Cassia looks away, horrified.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Sus... sus colores! ¡Qué jirones tan terribles y pavorosos! Solo un loco se haría algo semejante a sí mismo...». {n}Cassia aparta la mirada, horrorizada.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Leur... Leurs couleurs ! Chaotiques, horribles et effrayantes ! Seul un fou s'infligerait une chose pareille... » {n}Horrifiée, Cassia détourne le regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Their... their colours! Horrible, frightening, tattered shades! Only a madman could do something like that to himself..." {n}Cassia looks away, horrified.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Leur... Leurs couleurs ! Chaotiques, horribles et effrayantes ! Seul un fou s'infligerait une chose pareille... » {n}Horrifiée, Cassia détourne le regard.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「彼らの…彼らの色！身の毛のよだつ、恐ろしい、ぼろぼろの影！自分身にあんなことをするなんて、狂人でしかありえない…」{n}カシアは恐ろしくて目をそらす。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Their... their colours! Horrible, frightening, tattered shades! Only a madman could do something like that to himself..." {n}Cassia looks away, horrified.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「彼らの…彼らの色！身の毛のよだつ、恐ろしい、ぼろぼろの影！自分身にあんなことをするなんて、狂人でしかありえない…」{n}カシアは恐ろしくて目をそらす。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Re... Renkleri! Ne korkunç, dehşet verici tonlar! Böyle bir şeyi kendine yapmak için deli olmak lazım..." {n}Cassia, dehşete düşmüş hâlde başını çeviriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Their... their colours! Horrible, frightening, tattered shades! Only a madman could do something like that to himself..." {n}Cassia looks away, horrified.{/n}
